# It's Black Friday! That day where we're all looking for the best deals!

We have a great deal for you! 

Make sure you order fast as the deal expires Friday midnight!

**[Hostio Solutions](https://hostio.solutions/ "Hostio Solutions") now offers you Virtual Private Servers with a 50% discount for the first 6 months!**

# Hostio VPS X1

From €11 for **€5,50 per month**
- 1 Dedicated Core 3GHz+
- 1 GB RAM
- 25 GB SSD storage
- 2 TB Premium traffic
- Netherlands

# Hostio VPS X2

From €21 for **€10,50 per month**

- 1 Dedicated Core 3GHz+
- 2 GB RAM

- 5 TB Premium traffic

# Hostio VPS X4

From €42 for **€21,00 per month**

# Hostio VPS X8

From €83 for €41,50 per month

## Use discount code: blackfriday2020 in your shopping cart and get a 50% discount on your VPS for the first 6 months!

[ORDER HERE!](https://bit.ly/hs-blackfriday2020 "Order here!")
